get.summary:
Lists aggregated monthly meterings for the account identified by the given ID.
Each summary represents the total metering amount for one month.
Required permissions:
- read:payment_information

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the account (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

get.summary:
Lists detailed metering entries for a specific month for the account identified by the given ID.
Required permissions:
- read:payment_information

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the account (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: The year to filter meterings by (e.g., 2025).

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: The month to filter meterings by (1 = January, 12 = December).

items.description: List of detailed metering items for the specified month.

v1ListMeteringsResponse.title: ListMeteringsResponse is the response from the ListMeterings function

v1ListMonthlyMeteringsResponse.title: ListMonthlyMeterings is the response from the ListMonthlyMeterings function

accountId.description: The identifier of the account this metering item belongs to (in GUID format).

clusterId.description: The identifier of the cluster associated with this usage (in GUID format).

clusterName.description: The name of the cluster involved in this metering.

startTime.description: The start time of the metering window (UTC).

endTime.description: The end time of the metering window (UTC).

billableEntityId.description:
The identifier of the billable entity (in GUID format), such as a cluster
booking or another billable resource.

billableEntityType.title:
The type of the billable entity (e.g., "ClusterBooking").
TODO do we want to have a list (enum) of billable resources?

partner.title: TODO in my account, I only see `aws`, `azure`, `gcp`. Are there other "partners"? Could this be renamed to `cloud_provider_id`?

pricePerHour.description: The unit price in millicents per hour (e.g., 4112 = $0.04112/hour).

usageHours.description: Usage duration in decimal hours. (e.g., 2.5 = 2 hours and 30 minutes).

amountMillicents.description: The total charge for this item, in millicents.

discountAmountMillicents.description: The total discount applied to this item, in millicents.

discountAmountPercent.description: The Discount applied as a percentage (e.g., 12.5).

currency.description: Currency of the different amount values, in ISO 4217 format (e.g., "USD").

v1MeteringItem.description: Metering represents a detailed metering item.

month.description: The month this summary represents (1 = January, 12 = December).

amountMillicents.title:
Total amount for the month in millicents.
Example: 499900 = $4.999

currency.description: Currency of the amount, in ISO 4217 format (e.g., "USD").

v1MonthlyMeteringSummary.description: MonthlyMeteringSummary represents a single month's metering summary.
